text: Goryachev (, from горячий meaning hot) is a Russian masculine surname, its feminine counterpart is Goryacheva. It may refer to *Anastasia Goryacheva, Russian ballerina *Grisha Goryachev (born 1977), Russian guitarist *Valentina Goryacheva (born 1935), wife of Yuri Gagarin *Svetlana Goryacheva (born 1947), Russian politician *Yevgeni Goryachev (born 1992), Russian football player ==See also== *5075 Goryachev, a minor planet Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Goryachev
